---

### get_root_data_path

>      get_root_data_path ()

Returns path to package_data in lib

Example:
    ``` python
    from nbdev_mkdocs._package_data import get_root_data_path

    req_path = get_root_data_path() / "requirements.txt"
    print(f"Path is: {req_path.resolve()}")
    assert req_path.exists()

    ```
